Format ae_format88 - 88 bit(s) 11111
AE_MOVT16X4 11100 1111 01
ae_fld_cmov_v 0 321
ae_fld_cmov_v0 3210
t4 10

Assembler Syntax

AE_MOVT16X4 aed0..15(ae_cmov_v), aed0..15(ae_cmov_v0), b0..15(bt4)

C Syntax

#include <xtensa/tie/xt_hifi2.h>

extern void AE_MOVT16X4(ae_int16x4 d /*inout*/, ae_int16x4 d0, xtbool4 bhl);

Description

AE_MOVT16X4 If b3210[0] is set, copy the contents of d0.0 to d.0; if b3210[1] is set, copy the contents of d0.1 to d.1. If b3210[2] is set, copy the contents of d0.2 to d.2; if b3210[3] is set, copy the contents of d0.3 to d.3.

Implementation Pipeline

In Out
ae_cmov_v Mstage, ae_cmov_v0 Mstage, bt4 Mstage ae_cmov_v Mstage

Protos that use AE_MOVT16X4

proto AE_MOVT16X4 { inout ae_int16x4 d, in ae_int16x4 d0, in xtbool4 bhl }{}{
AE_MOVT16X4 d, d0, bhl;
}
